result.title: Preparation of a master course
result.description: Preparation of a master course for disseminating the project knowledge to an audience with the typical background of Master Students in Civil Engineering of the five universities taking part in the project: the teaching module will be organised in 60 hours and a reduced version will be also tailored to be offered for the continuing education of concrete industry technicians and engineering practitioners.

result.title: D3.3 Innovation marketplace
result.description: The Innovation Marketplace will be created based on ALICE Knowledge Platform that will be adapted to host relevant RI Project results Outcome Implementation Cases and Logistics Clouds results following the valorisation guidelines Current Knowledge Platform business model supports this functionality Additionally matchmaking capabilities and other required functionalities and processes will be developed to create a full Innovation Marketplace as well as the longterm sustainability strategy ie economically for it This deliverable refers to Task 32
